# ByteConverter.FromUInt16 method

Writes an unsigned 8-bit value to a buffer.

```csharp
public void FromUInt16(ushort value, Span<byte> buffer)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The unsigned 8-bit value to write to the buffer. |
| buffer | The buffer to write the value to. |
